name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook initiates mitigation steps for an incident where an attacker executed malicious scripts to exfiltrate sensitive data.

action--8a2cad8e-fcf4-4f29-8a83-ef7c2f90.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--8a2cad8e-fcf4-4f29-8a83-ef7c2f90.description: Terminate any running PowerShell processes that may be executing malicious scripts.

action--1f76c966-eab1-4b6f-bf3e-09e181e4.name: Isolate affected host from network
action--1f76c966-eab1-4b6f-bf3e-09e181e4.description: Disconnect host-22 from the network to prevent further exfiltration.

action--e4df3a5c-d9c7-45c5-8a64-5e836cf5.name: Perform antivirus scan on infected host
action--e4df3a5c-d9c7-45c5-8a64-5e836cf5.description: Run antivirus scan on host-22 to detect and remove any remaining threats.

action--bc5c567b-f58f-461e-82b9-d1e40529.name: Review user permissions and revoke access
action--bc5c567b-f58f-461e-82b9-d1e40529.description: Identify and change ownership of files owned by the attacker.

action--1b492c98-9ec6-4147-8772-0c1953cc.name: Monitor traffic for abnormal patterns
action--1b492c98-9ec6-4147-8772-0c1953cc.description: Capture network traffic to monitor for any abnormal outgoing connections.
